date_compare.description: Compares two datetimes based on the relation given.

datetime_format_check.description: Checks whether a date or dateTime provided in a metadata field adheres to the ISO 8601 standard.

url_check.description: Checks if the url provided exists and is reachable

controlled_keywords_check.description: Checks if a given keyword is one of the controlled keywords

shortname_uniqueness.description: Checks if the shortname is unique.

abstract_length_check.description: Checks if the length of a given keyword is less than or equal to a given value

doi_check.description: Checks if the DOI is valid.

processing_level_id_check.description: Checks if the processing level id is one of the valid values

gcmd_keywords_check.description: Checks if the science keywords are valid gcmd keywords
